job_tasks.phrase: Take responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of applications-from PoC to production.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the traditional software engineering responsibility of managing an application from its initial concept (Proof of Concept) through to its live deployment and ongoing operation.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to the maintenance and evolution of the tech stack and frameworks, and support new features and architecture improvements to ensure scalability and reliability.
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the core software engineering tasks of maintaining, improving, and scaling the underlying technology and architecture of applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Work closely with core teams to ensure high-quality, reusable components
job_tasks.justification: This describes the collaborative development of software components, a fundamental aspect of software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: provide best practices, and help make data scientists and business users autonomous in building solutions end-to-end.
job_tasks.justification: This indicates a role that not only develops but also enables others (data scientists, business users) by providing guidance and best practices, implying an understanding of how to align technical solutions with user needs and business goals.
This is a direct mention of working with other teams, a key aspect of collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Help mentor new team members, participate in interviews, and contribute to onboarding processes.
job_tasks.justification: These are all activities that involve sharing knowledge, guiding, and integrating new members into a team, which falls under communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: Bring your expertise and enthusiasm to help grow a collaborative, inclusive, and innovative team culture.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase speaks to contributing to the team's culture, which implies taking ownership and driving positive change, aligning with innovation and team growth.

soft_skills.phrase: Help mentor new team members, participate in interviews, and contribute to onboarding processes.
Bring your expertise and enthusiasm to help grow a collaborative, inclusive, and innovative team culture.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses entirely on traditional software engineering tasks such as application lifecycle management, maintenance, feature development, architecture improvements, and component building. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The role also emphasizes collaboration and team growth, which are soft skills. Therefore, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear and directly describes software engineering responsibilities without any mention of AI/ML specific tasks. The language used aligns perfectly with the definition of a 'Software Engineer' profile in the coding book.
